additional_info:
Swimming pool, Built-in furniture, Internet, Cable-TV, Satellite, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas 
 For sale 3 storey private house in a quiet district of Tbilisi. 
Vake-Saburtalo, Didi Digomi
Utilities: water, sewage, electricity, gas, central heating, Internet, cable TV.
Land size is 1100 square meters and contains orchard and vineyard. 
There is a space left for a swimming pool (communications for a swimming pool are ready). 
Garage and the yard doors are remotely controlled.
3 floor House size is 587sq.m. + 165sq.m. - Open veranda.
One floor with 5 rooms is completely renovated. 
One floor with underground garage for 4 cars and a basement is partially renovated. 
One floor – No renovation.
